item.title: A beginner's guide to attending tech conferences
item.description: Ever since I walked past the George R. Moscone Convention Center in downtown San Francisco, I have been dreaming about being part of a conference which is held there. My big moment came with this years SIGNAL - Twilioâ€™s annual customer and developer conference. I had received a scholarship to attend the event. As a first time attendee, I navigated through this overwhelming tech gala and somehow, could figure out how to make use of the opportunity.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hey! I am Nasreen, a Web Developer from San Francisco. If you are eager to know the name of that Silicon Valley company I work for, it is coming soon.. ( hello recruiters, this smart techie is available in the job market. ) My interests and background is as diverse as the city. A Mechanical Engineer turned Nanotechnologist, who almost wanted to be a Journalist but found joy and peace in Programming.
